name: Set Persona based on Job Title in Pipedrive with ChatGPT
description:
This template is part of the [How to automate & maximize lead generation](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-9oX7XEISLs&ab_channel=Make) webinar. 

Improve your Pipedrive experience by setting persona according to job titles using ChatGPT, a clever solution to personalize and enhance CRM interactions.
